## Origin
C2 (SP) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020

## Insertion
Occipital bone (inferior nuchal line, middle third) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020

## Innervation
[Suboccipital N.]({{< var ref-suboccipital-nerve >}}) AKA Posterior ramus of C1 @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020

## Action

- **Bilateral**: Extend head
- **Unilateral**: I/L head rotation

# Muscle groups
Part of the [suboccipital muscle group]({{< var suboccipital_muscle_group >}})
